scripts.launch: pnpm run prepare-frontend && pnpm run build && electron .
scripts.package: pnpm --dir ../app build && pnpm run prepare-frontend && pnpm run build && electron-builder --dir --config electron-builder.json
scripts.package:dist: pnpm --dir ../app build && pnpm run prepare-frontend && pnpm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json
